attributes.action: Free dental treatment for patients with damage due to cancer treatments.
attributes.additional_details: I am starting this petition to try and get free dental treatments for patients with damage due to there cancer treatments.
attributes.background:
As a cancer patient who has undergone treatments, I developed a extremely dry mouth which in turn resulted in many cavities in my teeth.
All my life I have looked after my teeth but now had numerous filling and now extractions.
I was shocked to find that Cancer patients have to pay for treatment.
